actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend the credits for residential energy efficient property and new energy efficient homes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the tax credits for expenditures for: (1) nonbusiness energy property; (2) residential energy efficient property; and (3) new energy efficient homes.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend the credits for residential energy efficient property and new energy efficient homes.
